## Welcome {#welcome}

This is a template website that you can use for your own stuff! Hopefully this is easy to edit and adapt for anything you would like

## About

Dustin Haraden is a psychology professor and has a focus on transparency and equity when it comes to science and technology. Use this site however you can to increase your outreach! This is a template from [Openscapes](https://openscapes.org).

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(rio)
library(here)
library(tinytable)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(dplyr)

board <- import(here("data", "psyc101XP.xlsx"))

#tt(board)

#https://jthomasmock.github.io/gtExtras/articles/plotting-with-gtExtras.html

board %>% 
  arrange(desc(XP)) %>% 
  gt() %>%
  gt_plt_bar(column = XP, keep_column = TRUE, width = 35)


```
